text: The Tulkarm Governorate is a province of the Palestinian National Authority. It is located in in the northwest of the West Bank region of occupied Palestine. Tulkarm Governorate includes dozens of villages and towns. The capital city is Tulkarm. == Population centres == Tulkarm Governorate has dozens of population centres, which are as follows: الجهاز المركزي الفلسطيني للإحصاء - التجمعات السكانية في محافظة طولكرم 2017 The city of Tulkarm ( , the capital of the governorate.
